import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' export default function TableForm({description, setDescription , rate , setRate,quantity, setQuantity, amount ,setAmount,file ,handleFileChange}) { const calculateAmount = (amount) => { setAmount (quantity * rate) } return ( <>
setDescription(e.target.value)} />
setRate(e.target.value)} />
setQuantity(e.target.value)} />

{calculateAmount(amount)}

) }
